#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <bitset>
#include <utility>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <cstring>
#include <climits>
#include <map>
#include <cassert>

#define ull unsigned long long
#define ill long long int
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define F(i,a,n) for(i=(a);i<(n);++i)
#define FD(i,a,n) for(i=(a);i>=(n);--i)
#define FE(it,x) for(it=x.begin();it!=x.end();++it)
#define V(x) vector<x>
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define S1(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define epsilon 0.000000000000001
#define pie acos (-1.0)
#define MAXNODES 100001
#define sz size()
#define MAX 100009
#define gc getchar
using namespace std;

char a[109];
char b[109];
int n,m;
int mx,my;

int dp[102][102][102][2];


int f(int x, int y, int dif, int flag)
{
    if (y == m && x == n) {
        if (flag == 0) {
            if (dif == 0) return 0;
            return min(my,mx+dif);
        }
        if (dif == 0) return 0;
        return mx+dif;
    }

    int &result = dp[x][y][dif][flag];
    if (result != -1) return result;

    result = 1000000000;

    int cost=0;
    if (dif != 0) {
        if (flag == 0) cost = min(my,mx+dif);
        else cost = mx+dif;
    }

    if (y != m && x != n && a[x] == b[y]) result = min(result, cost+f(x+1, y+1, 0, 0));
    if (x != n && y != m) result = min(result, 1+cost+f(x+1, y+1, 0, 0));
    if (flag == 0) {
        if (y != m) result = min(result, f(x, y+1, dif+1, 0));
        if (x != n) result = min(result, cost+f(x+1, y, 1, 1));
    } else {
        if (x != n) result = min(result, f(x+1, y, dif+1, 1));
        if (y != m) result = min(result, cost+f(x, y+1, 1, 0));
    }
    return result;
}

int main()
{
  //  freopen ("input.txt", "r", stdin);

    int ii = 1;
    int t;
    S (t);
    while (t--) {
        printf ("Case %d: ", ii++);
        S (n);
        S (m);
        scanf ("%s", a);
        scanf ("%s", b);
      //  cout << a << " " << b << endl;
        S (mx);
        S (my);
        memset (dp, -1, sizeof(dp));
        printf ("%d\n", f(0,0,0,0));
    }

    return 0;
}
